A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After a very decent Force Awakens\, the Last Jedi was overly Disneyfied\, and did not jive with the intrigue or quality of previous films.  The movie lacked in character development but had an abundance of campy comedy that was no doubt injected by Disney.  Characters in the film were made disposable for the sake of a quick laugh or shock.  Heroes were assumed instead of created.  I recommend picking this up when the box set goes on sale.
